campaigns.title: Dune: Awakening Drops 5
campaigns.description: Experience the desert planet of Arrakis and earn exclusive in-game rewards! Get unique building components including Triangle Walls, Half Walls & Half Triangles, and Hatch Frame & Door by watching Dune: Awakening streams.
requirements: Watch for 1 hour to unlock Triangle Walls (Top Left, Top Right, Bottom Left, Bottom Right)
Watch for 2 hours to unlock Half Wall & Half Triangles (Top Left, Top Right, Bottom Left, Bottom Right and Half Height Wall)
Watch for 3 hours to unlock Hatch Frame & Hatch Door
Must have linked Steam and Twitch with Dune: Awakening account

campaigns.title: Dune: Awakening Drops 4
campaigns.description: Experience the desert planet of Arrakis and earn exclusive in-game rewards! Get unique building components and architectural elements by watching Dune: Awakening streams.
requirements: Watch for 1 hour to unlock Inverted Corner Stairs and Corner Stairs
Watch for 2 hours to unlock Round Window, Ladders and Column2
Watch for 3 hours to unlock Pillar, Pillar Bottom and Pillar Top
Must have linked Steam and Twitch with Dune: Awakening account

campaigns.title: Dune: Awakening Drops 3
campaigns.description: Experience the desert planet of Arrakis and earn exclusive in-game rewards! Get unique stillsuits, ornithopter skins, and desert survival gear by watching Dune: Awakening streams during launch week.
requirements: Watch for 30 mins to unlock the Observer Column
Watch for 1 hours to unlock the Observer round roof and foundation
Watch for 2 hours to unlock the Observer Wall2 and Round Wall
Must have linked Steam and Twitch with Dune: Awakening account

campaigns.title: Support a creator
campaigns.description: Show your allegiance to House Atreides and earn faction-specific rewards. This campaign features exclusive banners, weapons, and base decorations themed around Duke Leto's noble house.
requirements: Subscribe with 2 Subs to any participating streamer or gift 2 subs (any level) to receive the Atreides Officer Suit
Must have linked Steam and Twitch with Dune: Awakening account

campaigns.title: Dune: Awakening Drops 2
campaigns.description: Experience the desert planet of Arrakis and earn exclusive in-game rewards! Get unique stillsuits, ornithopter skins, and desert survival gear by watching Dune: Awakening streams during launch week.
requirements: Watch for 30 mins to unlock the Observer Passageway
Watch for 1 hours to unlock the Observer Stairs
Watch for 2 hours to unlock the Observer Window
Must have linked Steam and Twitch with Dune: Awakening account

campaigns.title: Dune: Awakening Launch Drops
campaigns.description: Experience the desert planet of Arrakis and earn exclusive in-game rewards! Get unique stillsuits, ornithopter skins, and desert survival gear by watching Dune: Awakening streams during launch week.
requirements: Watch for 30 mins to unlock the Observer Foundation
Watch for 1 hours to unlock the Observer Floor
Watch for 2 hours to unlock the Observer Wall
Must have linked Steam and Twitch with Dune: Awakening account
